protocol.name: P-GSE31158-2
protocol.text: Seedlings were placed into an airtight lucite chamber flooded with 99.998% argon for 2 hrs for hypoxia treatment.  Normoxic treatment required placing seedlings into an open lucite box for 2 hrs (mock).

protocol.name: P-GSE31158-3
protocol.text: Col-0 seedling were grown on 0.5x MS, 1% sucrose, 0.4% phytagel plates grown vertically for 10 days under long day conditions (16 hr light 8 hr darkness)

protocol.name: P-GSE31158-4
protocol.text: Seedlings were disected into root and shoot tissue and frozen in liquid nitrogen.  RNA were extracted using RNeasy plant mini kit (Quiagen).

protocol.name: P-GSE31158-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the 2-cycle synthesis and labeling kit (Affymetrix)

protocol.name: P-GSE31158-6
protocol.text: cRNA were hybridized onto ATH1 genechip according to the GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual R.5 (affymetrix)

protocol.name: P-GSE31158-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Workstation

protocol.name: P-GSE31158-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with the Bioconductor package in R using RMA.
